sentences.sentence: Thus investigating pragmatic inferencing from a Cognitive Linguistic perspective can further supple we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  and enrich the pragmatic theories.
sentences.translation: 因此，从认知语言学的角度来研究语用推理可进一步补充和丰富语用学理论。

sentences.sentence: Inference rules imple we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  forward inferencing, backward chaining, Prolog-style unification or other artificial intelligence (ai) -style rules.
sentences.translation: 推理规则实现演绎法、归纳法、prolog样式的统一或其他人工智能(artificial intelligence, AI)样式的规则。

sentences.sentence: And, in this paper, the inferencing method and algorithm on association tables are discussed, with the co-inference on different knowledge forms being considered.
sentences.translation: 本文讨论对关联表的具体推理实现，包括与其它知识表示方法的联合推理。
